PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-08782023-09-06NR
ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisAppointment of ROBERT GLEN COX of Winnipeg, Manitoba, to be a special adviser to the Minister of National Revenue, to serve as a member of the Independent Advisory Board on Eligibility for Journalism Tax Measures, to hold office during pleasure for a term of two years, on a part-time basis.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Appointment of ROBERT GLEN COX of Winnipeg, Manitoba, to be a special adviser to the Minister of National Revenue, to serve as a member of the Independent Advisory Board on Eligibility for Journalism Tax Measures, to hold office during pleasure for a term of two years, on a part-time basis.
